DELIVERY/ROAD CONSIGNMENT NOTE



BRAVO LOGISTICS LIMITED
Opp. Maersk Logistics, Mandela Road
P.O.Box 38387, DAR ES SALAAM
Tel: 255 22 2850579
Fax: +255 22 2850583
E-Mail: trucking@bravo.co.tz

Contact Persons
Eljon Dube Mob: +255 882 150005
Jacob Ngalula Mob: +255 716 213071
        
{% set no_of_packages, method_of_packing, container_no, gross_weight, nett_weight, seal_number, remarks = [0], [''], [''], [0], [0], [''], [''] %} {% if 'Container' == doc.return_cargo_type %} {% set _ = method_of_packing.append(method_of_packing.pop() + 'Containerized') %} {% if doc.return_cargo[0] is defined %} {% set _ = no_of_packages.append(no_of_packages.pop() + doc.return_cargo[0].no_of_packages) %} {% set _ = container_no.append(container_no.pop() + doc.return_cargo[0].container_number) %} {% set _ = gross_weight.append(gross_weight.pop() + doc.return_cargo[0].gross_weight) %} {% set _ = nett_weight.append(nett_weight.pop() + doc.return_cargo[0].net_weight) %} {% set _ = seal_number.append(seal_number.pop() + doc.return_cargo[0].seal_number|str) %} {% set _ = remarks.append(remarks.pop() + doc.return_cargo[0].extra_details|str) %} {% endif %} {% elif 'Loose Cargo' == doc.return_cargo_type %} {% set _ = method_of_packing.append(method_of_packing.pop() + 'Loose Cargo') %} {% set _ = no_of_packages.append(no_of_packages.pop() + doc.return_loose_no_of_packages.no_of_packages|int) %} {% set _ = gross_weight.append(gross_weight.pop() + doc.return_loose_gross_weight|int) %} {% set _ = nett_weight.append(nett_weight.pop() + doc.return_loose_net_weight|int) %} {% endif %}
